thread.title: Wall Street hideaway
thread.title_full: Wall Street hideaway - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ProfessorEnglish
title: Wall Street hideaway
text: This is apparently the tallest Holiday Inn, at 50 stories. Impressive as this is, it's also a drawback, since there are only three elevators: plan your day strategically! The rooms are compact but comfortable and quiet. The bathrooms are a little too compact: nowhere to put one's toiletries. The location is interesting, just two blocks from the Stock Exchange. One or two blocks from six or seven subway lines. A few blocks south of the World Trade Center site. Handy for walking across the Brooklyn Bridge. Overall, a part of New York that might give you a new view of the city.
